remarks: Lattice meet distributes over itself.  ( ~ inindi analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 8-Nov-2011.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
olmass.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
olmass.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
latmmdiN $p |- ( ( K e. OL /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( X ./\ ( Y ./\ Z ) ) = ( ( X ./\ Y ) ./\ ( X ./\ Z ) ) ) $.
